metadata.synopsis: First guard at the checkpoint. You can1) bribe the guard2) show Coronation Access Pass3) show Urgent Report for Duke Ravengard
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on |Klara Elin| - S_WYR_WyrmRock_SouthBridgeGuard_001 44b0baf1-84e8-4a67-bf45-81ee304bc731 - (6; 43; 176)ORenter trigger - S_WYR_WyrmRock_SouthBridgeSpotArea eb13e6d7-a0dc-4f85-9984-44b4a5fa4893 - (2; 42; 172)

40.speaker: Blaze Elin
40.text: Sorry, chum, can't let you through. Wyrm's Rock's closed for the day.

46.speaker: Wyll
46.text: Not closed to Duke Ulder Ravengard's own son, surely?

68.speaker: Blaze Elin
68.text: You having a laugh, devil-boy? I know Ravengard - and last I knew, his spawn wasn't sporting those horns.

11.speaker: Blaze Elin
11.text: The joke's on you. No entry - that's the end of it.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: See this? I've been invited to the ordination.

63.speaker: Blaze Elin
63.text: I'll be - you don't look the posh sort. Last door on the right. Go on, make merry.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: The guard tilts her head as if reading your documents. No reason to show the documents.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: As you can see, I have an urgent dispatch for Duke Ravengard.

77.speaker: Blaze Elin
77.text: Looks in order. Last door on the right. Don't keep the Duke waiting.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The guard tilts her head as if reading your documents. No reason to show the documents.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: What's so special about this occasion?

69.speaker: Blaze Elin
69.text: Ordination is what. Lord Gortash is becoming Archduke. All the peers came to pay regards.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Baldur's Gate is my home. I don't need permission to enter.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: This is ridiculous. I already got permission to enter.

23.speaker: Blaze Elin
23.text: Special occasion. Wyrm's Rock is closed - invited guests only.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Investigator Valeria needs me in the Lower City - a serial killer's on the loose.

29.speaker: Blaze Elin
29.text: Valeria? Well I'm not messing about with a murder inquiry, for damn sure.

67.speaker: Blaze Elin
67.text: Straight ahead, across the bridge. A blind ogre couldn't miss it.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Provide the pass you took from Valeria.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Not closed to Duke Ulder Ravengard's own son, surely?

1.speaker: Blaze Elin
1.text: Wyll Ravengard? Lord Gortash said you might be stumbling this way.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Not closed to Duke Ulder Ravengard's own son, surely?

55.speaker: Player
55.text: An assassin is in pursuit of Duke Ravengard. I need to warn him!

10.speaker: Blaze Elin
10.text: Hells - first Stelmane, and now this. Hurry up, then - last door on the right.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: The guard tilts her head as if reading your documents. No reason to show the documents.NodeContext: Bored

28.speaker: Blaze Elin
28.text: Bah - the place is near to bursting with guards. The duke's safer than a snail in a steel shell.

58.speaker: Blaze Elin
58.text: Bah - the place is crawling with Watchers. The duke's safer than a snail in a steel shell.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I'm here to protect Archduke-Elect Gortash.

16.speaker: Blaze Elin
16.text: How many bodyguards does the man need? Get on, then - last door on the right.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The guard tilts her head as if reading your documents. No reason to show the documents.NodeContext: Bored

42.speaker: Blaze Elin
42.text: Gortash's got all the protection he needs. A cultist makes so much as a peep, the Fist'll turn them to cinder.

27.speaker: Blaze Elin
27.text: Gortash's got all the protection he needs. A cultist makes so much as a peep, the Watch'll turn them to cinder.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Such a bother. What if I were to contribute to the 'Flaming Fist Orphans' Fund'?

38.speaker: Blaze Elin
38.text: Ah yes, the 'Orphans' Fund'. You can pay me directly - I'll make sure to pass your gold to the 'orphans'. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

43.speaker: Blaze Elin
43.text: I'll see that the 'orphans' put your donation to good use.

12.speaker: Blaze Elin
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: turns away from the player and calls out to unseen gatekeeper off-screenNodeContext: turns away from the player and calls out to unseen gatekeeper off-screen

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Please let me in - I'm meant to be in the coronation orchestra, it's my big break!

15.speaker: Blaze Elin
15.text: Workshy minstrels, I swear to Helm - Whatever. I'm not getting it in the neck because some flautist was missing.

37.speaker: Blaze Elin
37.text: You want the last door on the right. Hop to it, bard - you're late enough as is.

65.speaker: Blaze Elin
65.text: It's not my job to coddle workshy, disorganised minstrels. It's your job to turn up on time with everyone else. Sod off.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I am Lord Gortash's new occultist - let me pass or your name goes in the Book of Vile Darkness.

3.speaker: Blaze Elin
3.text: Don't know what he needs you for when he's got those bloody great Steel Watchers.

13.speaker: Blaze Elin
13.text: But... unprecedented times and all that. Head through - you want the last door on your right.

51.speaker: Blaze Elin
51.text: I'll shove your book somewhere vile and dark if you don't stop wasting my time.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: What if I were to contribute to the 'Flaming Fist Orphans' Fund'? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
